text:
Faithlife | Senior Full Stack Software Developer-Social Network | Bellingham, WA or Chandler, AZ | Full-time | Onsite

https://faithlife.com/jobs/SeniorFaithlifeFullStackSoftwareD...

Faithlife is looking for an experienced full stack engineer with the knowledge and skills to help build Faithlife Groups. Faithlife Groups is an online community that helps people find and create fellowship wherever they are.

You will be someone who can work well in a diverse environment of different languages and technologies. You should have expertise in responsive web and single page applications, but you will also have opportunities in the services, data, and architecture overall. You should also be able to provide positive technical leadership.

Check out all the developer positions we have open here, under Software Development: https://faithlife.com/careers

Please note that Faithlife will not sponsor applicants for work visas.
